title: Chapter 2 Quiz: Basic Greetings and Introductions

questions.question: What does "你好" mean?
questions.explanation: "你好" (nǐ hǎo) is the standard way to say "Hello" in Chinese.

questions.question: How do you say "My name is" in Chinese?
questions.explanation: "我叫___" (wǒ jiào ___) means "My name is ___" in Chinese.

questions.question: What does "很高兴认识你" mean?
questions.explanation: "很高兴认识你" (hěn gāoxìng rènshí nǐ) means "Nice to meet you" in Chinese.

questions.question: How do you ask "What's your name?" in Chinese?
questions.explanation: "你叫什么名字？" (nǐ jiào shénme míngzi?) means "What's your name?" in Chinese.

questions.question: What does "你从哪里来？" mean?
questions.explanation: "你从哪里来？" (nǐ cóng nǎlǐ lái?) means "Where are you from?" in Chinese.

questions.question: How do you say "I'm from America" in Chinese?
questions.explanation: "我来自美国" (wǒ láizì měiguó) means "I'm from America" in Chinese.

questions.question: How do you say "How are you?" in Chinese?
questions.explanation: "你好吗？" (nǐ hǎo ma?) means "How are you?" in Chinese.

questions.question: What does "我是学生" mean?
questions.explanation: "我是学生" (wǒ shì xuésheng) means "I'm a student" in Chinese.

questions.question: How do you say "I'm fine, thank you" in Chinese?
questions.explanation: "我很好，谢谢" (wǒ hěn hǎo, xièxie) means "I'm fine, thank you" in Chinese.

questions.question: What does "早上好" mean?
questions.explanation: "早上好" (zǎoshang hǎo) means "Good morning" in Chinese.

questions.question: How do you say "Good afternoon" in Chinese?
questions.explanation: "下午好" (xiàwǔ hǎo) means "Good afternoon" in Chinese.

questions.question: What does "晚上好" mean?
questions.explanation: "晚上好" (wǎnshang hǎo) means "Good evening" in Chinese.

questions.question: How do you say "You're welcome" in Chinese?
questions.explanation: "不客气" (bú kèqì) means "You're welcome" in Chinese.
